title: Taliyah Skin
body:
Hey Riot,
Since a long time Taliyah has just one skin. Will there in future maybe another Skin for her. There are so many skins, which are not very cool, and even if there are not so many Taliyah Player, a new Skin for her would be really nice

replies.body:
1. Deutsches Forum
2. Bekommt sie n√§chstes Jahr einen SSG Skin (es besteht allerdings auch die Chance, dass sie vorher zwischenzeitlich einen Skin bekommt).

Snowboard Taliyah would be nice
Or Skater Taliyah

Taliyah is getting new Skins in 2018 for sure. There were some leaks that Taliyah is getting a Skin called "Crystalheart Taliyah" but its not sure. I dont think it would be better than the Freljord one but better than no Skin. 
I would love to have Taliyah with a ssg-skin especially if they are as good as the last ones (Nami backport sushi xD)

I totally agree with the OP. Taliyah is such a nice Champion with so much Skin-Potential. Just imagine the whole Avatar-Elemtal-Theme or i could also see her as a Starguardian.
I would really appretiate a new Skin for her.
Yes, they are so cool and have so many potential for skins, but no one play this champs :(
